attributes.action: Let students in secondary school students wear their own clothes
attributes.additional_details: Some people can’t afford uniforms and different sizes every year. I do believe pe kits should still be a thing but we should get rid of uniforms. Not everyone can afford them
attributes.background: Students should be allowed to wear what they choose to wear. Talking about safety, secondary school students are wise enough to know what to do in case of emergencies.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:
Ban compulsory school uniforms
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639304
